document_name: Lessons-Lerned Report (Governance and Public Administration Programme Sekong- Citizen's Information Programme)
Lessons-Lerned Report (Governance and Public Administration Programme Sekong- Citizen's Information Programme)

outputs.output_descr: GPAR Sekong sets out to improve people's access to public services in the largely multi-ethnic province of Sekong. The project will rely on methods and tools developed at GPAR pilot projects to strengthen provincial oversight and capacities of government staff and institutions. Through the introduction of District Development Funds (DDF), aims in particular at developing strong decentralized governance systems at district khoum ban and village levels. The project has the following four outputs. 1. Improved oversight function and enhanced management capacity of Office of Governor and selected pilot offices                                                            2. Enhanced planning and coordination capacity at district level for better service delivery 3. Strengthened capacities of village and khoum ban leadership 4. Organisations and policy-makers at central level are informed about experience and lessons learnt from GPAR Sekong

GPAR Sekong sets out to improve people's access to public services in the largely multi-ethnic province of Sekong. The project will rely on methods and tools developed at GPAR pilot projects to strengthen provincial oversight and capacities of government staff and institutions. Through the introduction of District Development Funds (DDF), aims in particular at developing strong decentralized governance systems at district khoum ban and village levels. The project has the following four outputs. 1. Improved oversight function and enhanced management capacity of Office of Governor and selected pilot offices                                                            2. Enhanced planning and coordination capacity at district level for better service delivery 3. Strengthened capacities of village and khoum ban leadership 4. Organisations and policy-makers at central level are informed about experience and lessons learnt from GPAR Sekong

project_descr: GPAR Sekong Project: Improving access to public services for the multi-ethnic people of Sekong
project_title: GPAR Sekong: Improved Access to Services
